title: Fight inflation with both fiscal and mon policy

content.prompt: Which of the following combinations of policies is designed to decrease inflation?

choices.label: An increase in taxes and a decrease in the interest rate on reserves
An decrease in taxes and an increase in administered interest rates
A decrease in taxes and a decrease in administered interest rates
An increase in government spending and a decrease in the interest rate on reserves
A decrease in government spending and an increase in the interest rate on reserves
